SEARCH
Package main.java.models.worldmap

Class WorldMap

java.lang.Object
main.java.mvc.models.worldmap.WorldMap
public class WorldMap extends Object
Class representing the Warzone map Contains d_countries which is a HashMap containing all the countries on the map

  • Field Details

    • d_countries

      private final HashMap<Integer,Country> d_countries
      HashMap containing all countries. Key is the Country name and Value is the Country object

    • d_continents

      private final HashMap<Integer,Continent> d_continents
      HashMap containing the all continents on the map. Key is the Continent name and Value is the Continent object

  • Constructor Details

    • WorldMap

      public WorldMap()
      Constructor that initializes the Country and Continent HashMaps

  • Method Details

    • getCountries

      public HashMap<Integer,Country> getCountries()
      Retrieves the map of countries.
      Returns:
      The map of countries, where the key is the country ID and the value is the corresponding country object.

    • getContinents

      public HashMap<Integer,Continent> getContinents()
      Retrieves the map of continents.
      Returns:
      The map of continents, where the key is the continent ID and the value is the corresponding continent object.

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry (int p_countryID, int p_continentID, String p_countryName)
      Adds a country to the world map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The ID of the country to be added.
      p_continentID - The ID of the continent to which the country belongs.
      p_countryName - The name of the country to be added.

    • getD_countries

      public HashMap<Integer,Country> getD_countries()
      Method which returns list of country in form of a HashMap CountryID, Country

    • addBorder

      public void addBorder (int p_source, int p_target)
      Method which adds a border between a source and target country. This method is called from the map object but the border is created within the Country object
      Parameters:
      p_source - Country which will contain the new Border
      p_target - Country which border will "point" to

    • addContinent

      public void addContinent (int p_id, String p_continentName, int p_bonus)
      Method which adds continent to map
      Parameters:
      p_id - new continent identifier
      p_continentName - new continent name
      p_bonus - bonus value for new continent

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Method which checks if the Map is a connected graph
      Returns:
      true if fully connected graph, false if not

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected (HashMap<Integer,Country> p_countryList)
      Checks if the countries in the provided list are all connected.
      Parameters:
      p_countryList - The hashmap of countries to check for connectivity.
      Returns:
      true if all countries in the list are connected, false otherwise.

    • isContinentConnected

      public boolean isContinentConnected()
      Checks if all countries within each continent are connected.
      Returns:
      true if all countries within each continent are connected, false otherwise.

    • getContinentCountries

      public HashMap<Integer,Country> getContinentCountries (Continent p_continent)
      Method which gets list of countries associated with the provided continent
      Parameters:
      p_continent - Continent object for which countries should be retrieved
      Returns:
      HashMap of countries associated with continent

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent (int p_continentID)
      Method to remove a continent from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_continentID - The identifier of the continent to be removed.

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry (int p_countryID)
      This method removes a country from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The unique identifier of the country to be removed.

    • containsCountry

      public boolean containsCountry (int p_countryID)
      Method that checks if country exists in map
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - Country identifier integer
      Returns:
      true if found false if not found

    • containsCountry

      public boolean containsCountry (String p_countryName)
      Checks if the world map contains a country with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - The name of the country to check.
      Returns:
      true if the world map contains a country with the specified name, false otherwise.

    • containsContinent

      public boolean containsContinent (int p_continentID)
      Method that checks if continent exists in map
      Parameters:
      p_continentID - Continent identifier integer
      Returns:
      true if found false if not found

    • containsContinent

      public boolean containsContinent (String p_continentName)
      Checks if the world map contains a continent with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      p_continentName - The name of the continent to check.
      Returns:
      true if the world map contains a continent with the specified name, false otherwise.

    • getCountry

      public Country getCountry (int p_countryID)
      Retrieve country object based on country ID
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - Identifier of country to search for
      Returns:
      Country object with matching identifier

    • removeBorder

      public void removeBorder (int p_source, int p_target)
      Removes a border between two countries.
      Parameters:
      p_source - The ID of the source country.
      p_target - The ID of the target country.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either the source or target country does not exist.

    • getCountryID

      public int getCountryID (String p_countryName)
      Gets the ID of a country based on its name.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - The name of the country.
      Returns:
      The ID of the country, or -1 if not found.

    • getContinentID

      public int getContinentID (String p_continentName)
      Gets the ID of a continent based on its name.
      Parameters:
      p_continentName - The name of the continent.
      Returns:
      The ID of the continent, or -1 if not found.
